name: Voisse
tag_list: enhanced-podcast, online-voice-recorder, record-your-voice-online, voice-recorder, free-online-voice-recorder, podcast-creator, build-a-podcast-online, make-a-podcast, enhanced-podcast-creator, audio-slideshow, add-audio-to-images, audio-slideshow-creator
overview:
Voisse - bringing images to life with the power of the spoken word

An online platform for recording and sharing audio content is being launched by UK company, Voisse.

Voisse lets people easily record, keep and share audio content - whatever they want, whenever they want, wherever they want - and lets them do something useful with it.

Voisse can be used to record stories, events, business discussions and personal messages, anything from the past and present: a brideâ€™s thoughts on her wedding day, a new mother capturing her feelings, grandmaâ€™s wartime memories or a studentâ€™s gap year travel diary.

By recording peopleâ€™s voices using any familiar method - online and phone (including Skype), then adding images, users can group recordings to create audio slideshows which can either be viewed online or remotely on portable devices, like iPods as enhanced podcasts, or even sell their creations in the online marketplace.

Integral to Voisse is a vibrant community that lets people share their content with their friends, families and the world through their preferred social network. Alternatively users can embed directly to websites and blogs from one central place within Voisse.com.
